result.relevanceClues: The episode is directly related to sports as it features two-time gold medalist speed skater Apolo Ohno and his fiancee, Bianca Stam, taking on the wall to raise money for the Team USA Fund, supporting future Olympic and Paralympic athletes.

The episode focuses on raising money for the Team USA Fund, supporting future Olympic and Paralympic athletes. While not directly related to a specific charity, the episode does promote the importance of supporting athletes and the role of charitable giving in doing so.
